pages.title: Actions
pages.description:
Events that change the data.

##### 1. Actions
```js
const action = { type: 'ACTION_NAME' };
```

##### 2. Action Creators

```js
const actionName = () => ({ type: 'ACTION_NAME' });
```

##### 3. Action Types

```js
const ACTION_NAME = 'ACTION_NAME'
```

hints: wrap your output object in round brackets

tasks.description: add a param of `id` to your action creator
Use the action type inside your `voteUp` action creator. Notice how your editor may autocomplete the action type.
hints: change "VOTE_UP" to use the constant VOTE_UP
